+++ SUMMARY

ObjectDeviceIsolatorSignalAudio
  
  
  * Design exists for both 1 input and 2 input modules. 
  * Supports mono TRS or XLR inputs.
  * A single input has
    * 1/4 TRS input: rel://files/_QTWE56S0AQR69DHQPO7E.png 
    * XLR Input 
    * 1/4 TRS Output 
    * XLR Output.

      
  * Main high level components/sub-systems ()
    * 1:1 audio Transformer
    * pull down 20k resistors on all lines to reduce "pops"
    * RC "Zobel network"
      * prevent self-resonance effects/shunts frequencies above ~20kHz to ground
  

  * Tip is +, sleeve -. 
  
  * 1 pair of input jacks, 1 pairs of output jacks. 
    * 4 connectors total
